text: Iván Vargas (born 5 June 1991) is a Paraguayan football left midfielder. He currently plays for Club Rubio Ñu. ==International career== Vargas was one of the best players for the Paraguay national under-20 football team at the 2011 South American Youth Championship, where Paraguay finished in second place. ==External links== *Profile at BDFA Category:Paraguayan footballers Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Association football midfielders Category:Paraguay international footballers Category:Club Rubio Ñu footballers
title: Iván Vargas
